title: Riot admitted to inappropriately suspending my account.
body:
I was in my first game of the day 6 days ago and as soon as the game ended the client crashed I wasn't able to log back in and instead got a notice saying my account was suspended until October 13th. I checked the email associated with the account and there were no details on the suspension. 

I have never been chat restricted or been reported for inappropriate behavior because I am a pretty quiet player, I have no apps on my computer that would be detected as 3rd party software and I never have anything besides chrome running when I play, I checked their repayment portal site and I have no outstanding payments that need to be taken care of. 

They have not answered me on the boards, it has been 7 days since I sent in my support ticket and no response, and they constantly remove my posts on the boards. 

Are they basically admitting to wrongfully suspending me?

replies.body: No worries riot seems to have messed up their little ban bot program i just got permabanned without ever being 14 day banned or chat restricted neither 10 or 25 days. i did however get into low priority queue because of remake as i was in the bathroom for the first time of my life let's see if riot will respond
I did respond. You were banned for extreme verbal abuse and usage of hate speech.

Very simple: anything that offends people should not be tolerated. Hate speech offends people. GG. 

Regardless if whether or not you THINK it should, it does. So it should not be tolerated. And to many people, it quite clearly does and is intended to offend, is it not? Now, you can create all the 'DONT LET HATE SPEECH OFFEND YOU' that you want and if, miraculously, some day you manage to spread your message to the majority of players, we can go back to tolerating hate speech.

But there's the problem: it's not hate speech if no one is offended by it. Therefore, by the inherent nature of what it is, hate speech can't be tolerated. What CAN change is the CLASSIFICATION of WHAT counts as hate speech to most people.

A) I'm sure pretty much EVERYTHING would offend SOMEONE on the planet Earth. I'm not proposing we ban communication, only that which would offend at least some significant group of people.

B) If you could physically hurt someone through League, would doing so intentionally be a bannable offense? In my opinion, it would. Why would it be any different for something that hurts people emotionally? If trolling hurts you and should be bannable, why should hate speech, which hurts maybe not you, but many people not be bannable?

Also, you have to consider the fact that League of Legends is a game in the end. I'm not advocating using the same logic as I am here for law making. But in this community, we should simply set aside our differences and converse as unification as gamers.
